name: Apten
headline: Customizable AI SMS agents for businesses
description: Apten is an AI SMS agent that automates sales and marketing for B2C service businesses. We help businesses build custom agents that drive higher lead conversion and deliver personalized messaging at scale.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:marketing; industry:sms; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Daniel Ho, Founder
founders.description: Daniel is the Co-founder & CEO @ Apten. Previously a PM at Tesla building systems to automate the detection and chargeback of supplier issues ($XXM in cost recovery / year). Built supply chain analytics at Amazon, Lucid Motors, and Walmart. Studied Economics + Data Science at UC Berkeley.

founders.name: Roshan Kumaraswamy, Founder
founders.description:
Roshan is the Co-founder & CTO at Apten.

Before Apten, Roshan spent three years at AWS building sales planning applications & data platforms to empower the AWS Sales org. Before that, he ideated & built multi-data source capabilities for Flux (language) at InfluxData (YC W13) as one of their first interns, and studied EECS at UC Berkeley for 3 years.

generated_description:
### Apten: Your Customizable AI SMS Agent

**Overview**  
Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Apten is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to revolutionize business communications with customizable AI SMS agents. With a lean team of just two employees, Apten specializes in providing automated sales and marketing solutions for B2C service businesses.

**What They Do**  
Apten's platform allows businesses to build AI SMS agents tailored to their unique needs. These agents aren’t just about automation—they’re designed to enhance lead conversion and deliver personalized messaging at scale. Think of Apten as your 24/7 engagement partner, following up with leads and responding on your behalf, whether via SMS or voice.

**Key Features**  
- **Customized AI Conversations**: Tailor conversation flows to guide leads through personalized experiences.
- **Dynamic Follow-ups**: Schedule custom follow-ups based on lead responses, ensuring no opportunity is missed.
- **Multi-Channel Support**: Use both SMS and voice to engage with customers.
- **Contextual Understanding**: Pull in past communications and CRM data for relevant and informed conversations.
- **Real-Time Notifications**: Get alerts for important requests to seamlessly bring human intervention when needed.
- **Integration Friendly**: Apten connects with various CRM platforms and tools, ensuring it fits within your existing tech ecosystem.

**What's Next?**  
As they hone their product and grow their clientele, Apten is poised for an exciting journey in the AI-driven communications landscape. If you’re a business looking to optimize your sales and marketing efforts, you can learn more and request a demo via their website [apten.ai](https://www.apten.ai/).

**Final Thoughts**  
In a world flooded with generic chatbots, Apten stands out by offering a personalized approach that aligns with the nuances of human interaction. If you’re looking to convert leads effectively while maintaining the human touch, Apten might just be the tool you need.
